free_text.Content: [b]1. Periodic table of elements:[/b] atomic structure, relation between the position of the elements in the periodic table and their chemical and physical properties.[br/][b]2. Bonds, chemical reaction and stoechiometry:[/b] different types of bond, influence on the physical and chemical properties of compounds, chemical reactions and equilibrium, acids and bases, buffer, solubility.[br/][b]3. Thermodynamics:[/b] chemical energy transformation, internal energy, enthalpy, Hess law, free energy, equilibrium. [br/][b]4. Kinetics:[/b] reaction rate, reaction order, theory of activated complex, catalysis.[br/][b]5. Electrochemistry:[/b] Faraday's law, electrolysis, Nernst equation.[br/][b]6. Organic chemistry:[/b] hydrocarbons, functional groups, natural compounds.[br/][br/]
